channel.title: Django2.2 on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Django Server Error (500) strategy [2019 adokare]
item.description: This is my first time joining the Advent Calendar. Thank you. Overview My hobby is Pythonista. This year I introduced to Django and made a website. This time, for the same Django beginner as I am, I’ll try to write a rough guide to how to get rid of things that will bother you and make you cry. It is Server Error (500). At this time, try to display the error content on the screen even temporarily, output a log, or notify Slack of the error content.
